scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.server: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ && nodemon server/index.js
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm run start
scripts.manifest: del "appManifest\appManifest.zip" 2> nul && powershell Compress-Archive appManifest/* appManifest/appManifest.zip
